title: Affirmative Action's Future
description:
A court case is underway in Boston that could ultimately determine the future of affirmative action. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Peter Jeffrey about the case and how it could end up at the Supreme Court and hinge on the vote of newly-minted Justice Brett Kavanaugh. 
FOLLOW UP
 Peter's latest report: Harvard Fight With Conservatives Over Admissions Could Reach Kavanaugh
You can follow Peter at: @peter_jeffrey
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
